snippet.title: LD48 - Dikes and Polders
snippet.description:
Our ludum dare 48 entry: 
https://neil-sadie.itch.io/dikes-and-polders

Polder: a piece of low-lying land reclaimed from the sea or a river and protected by dikes, especially in the Netherlands.

Build windmills to drain the sea, allowing for the growing of very valuable tulips!

Instructions:

Build windmills to clear the water in a 3x3 area 
Build tiles to create fields of flowers, flowers can only be placed if at least one of the tiles is next to a windmill or a field of the same color.
Points are scored when at least 3 fields of color are added.
Score points to create more windmills!
